name: localstack-mcp-server
description: A LocalStack MCP Server providing essential tools for local cloud development & testing

tools.name: localstack-management
tools.description: Manage LocalStack lifecycle: start, stop, restart, or check status

tools.name: localstack-logs-analysis
tools.description: LocalStack log analyzer that helps developers quickly diagnose issues and understand their LocalStack interactions

tools.name: localstack-iam-policy-analyzer
tools.description: Configures LocalStack's IAM enforcement and analyzes logs to automatically generate missing IAM policies

tools.name: localstack-deployer
tools.description: Deploys or destroys AWS infrastructure on LocalStack using CDK or Terraform

prompts.name: localstack-start
prompts.text: Start my LocalStack container with the auth token ${arguments.auth_token}.

prompts.name: localstack-status
prompts.text: Check the status of my LocalStack container.

prompts.name: localstack-logs
prompts.text: Get the logs of my LocalStack container and analyze them for any issues or errors.

prompts.name: localstack-service-logs
prompts.description: Get the logs of a specific service in LocalStack
prompts.text: Get the logs of the ${arguments.service_name} service in my LocalStack container and analyze them for any issues or errors.

prompts.name: cdk-deployment
prompts.description: Deploy a CDK project to LocalStack
prompts.text: Please help me deploy my CDK project located at ${arguments.project_path} on my LocalStack container.

prompts.name: terraform-deployment
prompts.description: Deploy a Terraform project to LocalStack
prompts.text: Please help me deploy my Terraform project located at ${arguments.project_path} on my LocalStack container.

prompts.name: iam-troubleshooting
prompts.description: Troubleshoot IAM policy issues with LocalStack
prompts.text: Please help me enable IAM enforcement on LocalStack and run ${arguments.test_description} to analyze any policy issues or violations.
